entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
